input.label: How far back do you want Splunk to search? (Default -28d)
How big of a timespan you want Splunk to consider for each sample. To check if data is coming in once per day, use 24h. (Default 24h)
How many datapoints will you have? This is generally your earliest time divided by timespan. So if you search back 28 days, and have a span of 24 hours, this value is 28. (Default 28)
